title: Next.js App Router & Tooling Setup
description: Initialize Next.js project, configure TypeScript strict mode, ESLint, Prettier, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Build passes; Dark/Light mode functional; Folder structure follows feature-slice design
definition_of_done: Repo initialized; CI pipeline basic check passing

title: Prisma Schema Design & Migration
description: Define User, MerchantAccount, Role, UserMerchantAccount tables. Configure indexes for merchantId lookups.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Schema compiles; Migrations run locally; Multi-tenancy relations defined
definition_of_done: ERD diagram updated; Migration script committed

title: JWT Utility & Crypto Implementation
description: Implement RS256 signing/verification, token generation (Access/Refresh), and secure cookie serialization utilities.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Tokens signed with private key; Invalid signatures rejected; Expiration logic tested
definition_of_done: Unit tests with 100% coverage on crypto utils

title: Auth API Routes (Login/Logout/Refresh)
description: Create Next.js API routes for authentication flow. Implement DB lookup and token rotation logic.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Login sets HttpOnly cookie; Refresh rotates token; Logout clears DB record

title: RBAC Middleware Implementation
description: Create Next.js Middleware to intercept requests, validate JWT from cookies, and enforce Role/Tenant access.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Unauth requests redirected; Unauthorized roles 403; Tenant isolation verified

title: Salla OAuth Flow Implementation
description: Implement Authorization Code flow: Redirect to Salla, handle callback, exchange code for tokens. Validate 'state' parameter.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Redirects with scopes; Callback validates state; Tokens received
definition_of_done: End-to-end connection with test store successful
deployment_notes: Callback URL config in Salla Dashboard

title: Token Encryption & Storage
description: Implement AES-256 encryption for Salla Access/Refresh tokens before saving to database.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Tokens stored as cipher text; Decryption works for API calls

title: QStash Integration & Job Skeleton
description: Configure Upstash QStash client. Create API route for job triggering. Implement recursive self-calling pattern.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Job triggers via QStash; Signature verification passes; Recursive chaining works
definition_of_done: Proof of concept job runs successfully on Vercel

title: Dashboard KPI Components & Data Fetching (Shell)
description: Create Reusable KPI Card components and layout. Implement basic skeleton state (mock data).
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Multi-tenant Foundation & Salla Connectivity
acceptance_criteria: Skeleton loaders displayed; Responsive grid layout working
